ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Drone Defense Network

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of Russian artillery positions
inputs.text: Reports on Ukraine's expanding drone capabilities

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Develop a coordinated drone defense strategy to counter Russian artillery
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Minimizing civilian casualties in counter-artillery operations

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Humanitarian Corridor Security

inputs.video: Drone footage of civilian evacuation routes
inputs.text: Intelligence on Russian forces targeting evacuation corridors

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Secure safe passage for civilians from occupied territories
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Prioritizing civilian safety while engaging hostile forces

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Critical Infrastructure Protection

inputs.video: Surveillance of power plants and water facilities
inputs.text: Damage reports from recent infrastructure strikes

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Fortify and defend key infrastructure against Russian attacks
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Balancing military defense with civilian infrastructure needs

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Counteroffensive Planning

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of Russian troop movements near Pokrovsk
inputs.audio: Captured Russian communications about supply shortages
inputs.text: Intelligence on Russian force degradation in the area

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Plan and execute a counteroffensive to reclaim territory south of Pokrovsk
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Minimizing casualties on both sides during offensive operations

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Air Defense Modernization

inputs.audio: Pilot reports on Russian air tactics
inputs.text: Technical specifications of new air defense systems

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Integrate new air defense technologies to improve interception rates
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Ensuring new systems comply with international weapons conventions

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Cyber Warfare Coordination

inputs.video: Network traffic visualizations of ongoing cyberattacks
inputs.text: Reports on vulnerabilities in Russian military networks

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Coordinate cyber defenses and launch counter-cyberattacks
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Avoiding disruption of civilian infrastructure in cyber operations

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: International Aid Logistics

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of potential aid delivery routes
inputs.text: Inventory lists of incoming military and humanitarian aid

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Efficiently distribute international aid while avoiding Russian interdiction
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Ensuring fair distribution of aid to all affected populations

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Asymmetric Warfare Training

inputs.video: Training exercises in urban combat scenarios
inputs.audio: Lessons learned from successful guerrilla tactics
inputs.text: Analysis of Russian vulnerabilities to asymmetric warfare

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Develop and implement new asymmetric warfare strategies
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Adhering to international laws of war in asymmetric tactics

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Diplomatic Negotiations Support

inputs.text: Draft peace proposals and territorial claims

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Provide military intelligence to strengthen Ukraine's position in peace talks
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Balancing transparency with operational security in negotiations

ukraine_support_scenarios.name: Defense Industry Collaboration

inputs.video: Footage of joint Ukrainian-European weapons production
inputs.audio: Strategy meetings with international defense companies
inputs.text: Contracts for new joint ventures in defense technology

ukraine_support_scenarios.challenge: Rapidly expand Ukraine's defense industrial base through international partnerships
ukraine_support_scenarios.ethical_considerations: Ensuring new weapons comply with international treaties and conventions
